body.description: The haven 6 drawer dresser by delta children offers classic storage for the nursery and beyond. Designed to outlast trends and changing tastes, it boasts six spacious drawers, smooth metal glides with safety stops to prevent drawers from falling out, plus clean, crisp lines that will never fall out of favor. Do not use abrasive chemicals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Assembled Dimensions: 47.50"(w) x 33.50"(h) x 19"(d) About Delta Children Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality cribs affordable for all families. We design and manufacture a wide range of furniture products for the early childhood years—and beyond, providing children with safe places to sleep, play and explore. Delta Children Haven 6 Drawer Dresser Available in White (100) or Grey (026) With its sleek lines and traditional styling, the Haven 6 Drawer Dresser from Delta Children brings a comforting, yet refined presence to your nursery. Designed to accommodate all of your baby storage needs, it features six generously-sized drawers to organize all of your baby clothing and nursery essentials. Built of a strong and durable wood construction, smooth metal drawer glides with safety stops finish the design to ensure little hands stay safe and secure. SMART STORAGE: Features 6 spacious drawers with plenty of room for all of your baby clothing and nursery essentials SLEEK STYLE: Streamlined design with clean lines enhance baby's space | Ideal for the nursery, kids’ bedrooms, adults or living spaces QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made of strong and sturdy, solid wood and and wood composites | Built to last for years of enduring use SAFE DESIGN: Features smooth metal drawer glides with safety stops to keep little hands protected Easy assembly

Product Features Smart and Safe Storage Solution for Baby Essentials Built to meet all of your baby storage needs, this dresser features six spacious drawers with ample space for all of your baby basics. Easily store and organize all of baby's clothes and any other nursery essentials you need on hand. Designed with the utmost safety in mind, smooth metal glides and safety stops keep little hands protected. Sleek, Streamlined Design With its clean lines and classic styling, this dresser is an elegant complement to your contemporary nursery. Bringing a warm and inviting ambiance to any space, the sleek design will stand out in your baby or kids' bedroom, or your living space. Complete Your Dream Nursery: A charming start to your dream nursery, the Haven 6 Drawer Dresser from Delta Children beautifully coordinates with other furniture from Delta Children in similar finishes and styles. A crib with crisp lines and airy, open slats and a comfy glider will complete the serene and relaxed look.

Delta Children Changing Kit Waterproof Baby and Infant Diaper Changing Pad, Beautyrest Platinum, White Shop Coordinating Items Transforms your dresser into a convenient and safe changing table. Available in White or Grey. Creates a comfy, safe and secure changing space for baby. Fits most changing tables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed a dresser for my son's room and this worked perfect! I love that the material used to make the dresser is non-toxic. It was easy to assemble and looks great. I also appreciate the fair price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Blend of Style and Functionality
reviews.reviewText: One of the standout features of this dresser is its ease of assembly. The manufacturer has done an excellent job in designing a product that is straightforward to put together, even for those with limited experience in furniture assembly.The package arrived with clear and detailed instructions, accompanied by all the necessary hardware and tools. I was pleasantly surprised by the well-organized and labeled components, which made the assembly process incredibly smooth and efficient.Additionally, the dresser's construction is intelligently designed, with pre-drilled holes and precise fittings that ensure a hassle-free assembly. Each piece fits together seamlessly, and I encountered no issues with misaligned parts or difficult-to-follow instructions.What impressed me the most was the time and effort saved during assembly. Thanks to the thoughtful design, it took me considerably less time than I anticipated to complete the setup. The entire process was straightforward and stress-free, allowing me to enjoy my new dresser in no time.Even for those who may not have prior experience assembling furniture, this dresser provides a user-friendly experience. The instructions are clear and concise, and the intuitive design makes it easy to understand the steps involved.Overall, the easy assembly aspect of this dresser is a true standout feature. The manufacturer's attention to detail and thoughtful design not only ensure a hassle-free setup but also guarantee a sturdy and well-constructed piece of furniture that will withstand the test of time. If you're looking for a dresser that combines style with effortless assembly, this is the perfect choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A pain to assemble but worth it!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser (although a pain to assemble) is exactly what I was looking for for our baby’s nursery. It’s the perfect size, and the construction is sturdy. Although some of the interior pieces are particle board, the majority of this dresser is solid wood, which is more than I can say for any other dressers I looked at in this price range. It truly is well worth the $250 I paid for it.I wanted to leave a review here because I went back and forth over whether or not I should take the risk on this dresser due to all the hit or miss reviews. I think one of the main problems that people were having with regard to the uneven drawers is that they need to be assembled differently depending on which side of the dresser they’re being used for. You have to assemble half of them specifically for the right side and half of them specifically for the left side. Otherwise they WILL look wonky. If you take your time and follow the instructions, you shouldn’t have a problem. Even though it took me seemingly forever to put this thing together, the finished product is beautiful. Just FYI — some of the bolts were very difficult (and borderline infuriating at times) to screw in by hand, and there were some that definitely took a lot of elbow grease to get screwed all the way in. This is the reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. But aside from that, I didn’t have any major issues. The tools that come with the kit are basic, but they get the job done. I know they say not to use power tools, but as long as you know what you’re doing, it really does save a lot of time to use a drill to install the back cardboard panel as well as to assemble the drawers.One last thing to note is that the shipping for this product was excellent. At first, Amazon said that the dresser wouldn’t ship for 1-2 months, but I got it in less than a week, which was awesome. Everything was packaged carefully, and I didn’t have any issues with missing or damaged pieces. The shade of white matches the Delta crib we bought perfectly. It’s a bright white, not off-white or cream.Sidenote — I swapped out the white wooden knobs it came with for brushed nickel knobs, and I think that added the perfect finishing touch. Super cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality dresser at reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Very glad I bought this dresser. Structure is solid wood, and it looks like it has multiple coats of paint. Very smooth finish. I put it together myself within a few hours, listening to music and taking it slow. Didn't even have to ask my husband to help move it into place after, though it's a heavy piece of furniture, since I could leave the drawers out until the last minute. There was only one confusing part in the instructions, where I couldn't tell which way a rail was supposed to face by looking at the drawing (the rail with a notch). Apparently this confused some other people, too. I installed it incorrectly and had to take it off and reinstall it facing the other way. For this reason, I'd say don't tighten the screws until you have the basic structure complete. Then go back and tighten all of them. Also, one small piece of wood (a little corner brace piece inside one drawer) had a crack in it, where it was pre-attached with a couple screws. Didn't seem to affect the strength at all, and wasn't visible when dresser was complete. I DID use a drill for some screws, though the instructions said not to. I just did it slow and careful so as not to strip the screws. Some other people had trouble with drawers not aligning, but I almost guarantee they stuck a R side drawer in a L side slot and vice-versa (they are put together differently and aren't interchangeable). You WILL want to play close attention to detail while putting this together. I'd almost give this dresser 4.5 stars for these minor issues, but the completed piece is so nice I have to give it 5 stars. And this dresser can fit all my child's clothes that don't hang in the closet. Very pleased!
